name: Classic Canadian Caesar
description: Canada's favourite drink. We consume over 250 million Casears in Canada every year!
preparation: Moisten rim of a tall glass with lemon or lime wedge and dip into Caesar Rim Trimmer™. Rotate gently to "frost" glass rim.
Place ice cubes in glass. Add vodka, mix, Worcestershire sauce and hot sauce (if you like it spicy). Stir to mix
Garnish with a toppings, if desired.
tips: For a twist, garnish with a pickled carrot, asparagus stalk, dill pickle, or a green bean instead of celery.
Make a Bold and Sassy Caesar by adding fresh or bottled horseradish, or Japanese wasabi.
Simply omit vodka to make a mocktail.
